ProcessTemplates.Name: Adobe Commerce / Magento to Zoho CRM - Products
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process retrieves product data from Adobe Commerce / Magento and either inserts or updates each product in Zoho CRM.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"MagentoBaseUrl":{"Value":"\"http://example.com\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The base URL for the Magento instance."},"MagentoUser":{"Value":"\"ExampleUser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The username for Magento."},"MagentoPassword":{"Value":"\"ExamplePassword\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The password for the Magento user."},"ZohoClientId":{"Value":"\"ExampleClientId\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client ID for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoClientSecret":{"Value":"\"ExampleClientSecret\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The client secret for Zoho CRM."},"ZohoApiUrl":{"Value":"\"https://www.zohoapis.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional domain for accessing the Zoho CRM API."},"ZohoAccountsUrl":{"Value":"\"https://accounts.zoho.eu\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The regional account domain for the Zoho CRM."},"ZohoRefreshToken":{"Value":"\"ExampleToken\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The token used for generating a new access token for authorizing Zoho CRM API requests."}}

Process.Name: Adobe Commerce / Magento to Zoho CRM - Products
Process.Description: This template process retrieves product data from Adobe Commerce / Magento and either inserts or updates each product in Zoho CRM.
